title: Computer Engineering Problem-Solving Process Using Mobile-Based PBL

context.prior_knowledge: Familiarity with basic programming and discrete mathematics, along with algorithm design experience
context.additional_context: Problem-solving integrated with professional tasks in smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real technical problems using PBL approaches and derive at least three cases applicable to mathematical modeling
Learners maintain over 80% participation while collaborating with team members to share solutions using mobile-based collaboration tools
Learners submit algorithmic solution approaches for presented technical problems within one week

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
